response.overview: "Bullet Time", an non-profit, amateur movie created by the Slikrat - a group of students of Warsaw University. The film is directed by Michał Wiśniewski, starring himself and Jan Kuncewicz as the perpetrators. The Movie has two phases. The first one takes the form of a paradocumentary consisting of interviews with the victims of the massacre. The other takes the form of an amateur camera video-diary, following the thoughts and actions of two students planning to conduct a school shooting at their university.
response.title: Bullet Time
